comment: Miss more than 4 classes & it's 1 point off final grade for each missed class. comment: Professor Nicholson is extremely strict with attendance. He will barely excuse anything as an absence besides COVID. He is not a caring or understanding professor when it comes to mental health problems nor does he give grace on students. If you sign up for his class be prepared to show up to every single class. Also 50% of grade is homework.

For a gen-ed class, Prof. Nicholson makes it relatively easy to get a good grade in this class if you put in a decent amount of effort. Grade is based on 50% tests (4 given but 3 used) and 50% writing assignments (15 in total with 500 word min.). BUT, this is a "skip class you WON'T pass class". Miss more than 4 classes and points are deducted.
